Name: Twerk it Girl!
About the game: You have no idea what to do? Simply,twerk it! Twerk it Girl is an casual game with a interesting and funny idea :) This game is an entertainment for those who cannot find motivation to lose weight. You as a the main hero, which is a girl , are forced to accumulate weight in order to become stronger in order to perform different physical exercises that require energy. The idea is to reach the finish line first to get on the podium and perform a phenomenal twerk for everyone! Your competitors will be other girls from different countries who will do their best to beat you. It will sound strange, but that's the only way you'll be successful, gain weight as soon as possible! Game Features : - 6 girls - The possibility to name the character - The chase for first place - Funny moments
